trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were 2 other sightings in New York on or around December 14th 2009
Summary: Bright color changing ball hovering around the sky.
divs: sighting detailsthis is my fifth sighting in a month. i've been seeing these bright balls floating around rockland a lot lately. they're too far to make out the craft but they dont have any blinking lights that would suggest anything official\ last night i saw two of these and i got the feeling they noticed me... one was a direct view out my window the bright thing was at some points zig zagging in the sky and it would sometimes fly in different directions but it pretty much stayed around the same area the whole time last night and it would often fly very high and back down again. very intriguing to watch. i recommend people in rockland keep their eyes open for these lights in the am hours. if anyone has any more information on these lights please post them up
